text.config.shrink_rays.option.minScale:
The smallest scale an entity can grow to
scale of 0.0625 means 2 blocks translate to 2 pixels
text.config.shrink_rays.option.maxScale:
The largest scale an entity can shrink to
scale of 3 means 2 blocks translate to 6 blocks
text.config.shrink_rays.option.returnSpe: How fast entities return to normal
